While it does not have crushing jaws, nor the strength to put on massive bursts of speed, it is more limber than the adult form, and its milk-tooth is still very sharp. ---- “Alligators commit errors of diet.”
-Bennet Bowler, M.D., _Contributions to the Natural History of the
Alligator, (Crocodilus Mississipiensis), with a Microscopic Addendum_,
p. 17. 1846.}} ==Useful Info== '''Baby alligators''' are small cold-blooded pests that lurk underwater before rushing you with surprising speed, much like a full grown [[alligator]] would. Although they can only deal moderate damage, they may appear in packs, often in the company of a mature alligator. Baby alligators can be found in [[the Swamp]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *All alligators move frighteningly fast when travelling through water, and the Swamp provides few opportunities for limiting the number of units you face at once. If you're not a heavily armoured melee fighter, don't be afraid to [[teleport]] or [[blink]] to safety if you see a pack closing in on you. ==History== Baby alligators were removed in [[0.17]].
